select a.I_IntId ,a.C_CarName ,a.I_NewTare ,a.C_SiteNo ,a.C_SiteName ,a.I_ISUSED ,a.C_CREATETIME ,a.C_CreateUserName ,a.C_UPDATETIME ,a.C_UpdateUserName from SM_TareWeight a where a.C_CREATETIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
